trans-unit.source: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.
An item is either a node or an atomic value.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem"></xref> class.
This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the item represents an XPath node or an atomic value.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item represents an XPath node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the item represents an atomic value.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.

If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the TypedValue property is equivalent to the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.Value%2A> property.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the item.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the item.
Returns the item's value as the specified type.
When overridden in a derived class, the ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.
The type to return the item value as.
The value of the item as the type requested.
The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
The attempted cast is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.
When overridden in a derived class, the ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.
The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions.
For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The type to return the item's value as.
The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object used to resolve namespace prefixes.
The value of the item as the type requested.
The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
The attempted cast is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.

The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Boolean> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The item's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Boolean> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Boolean> is not valid.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.

The ValueAsDateTime property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.DateTime> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The item's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.DateTime> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.DateTime> is not valid.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.Double>.

The ValueAsDouble property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Double> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The item's value as a <xref:System.Double>.
The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Double> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Double> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.

The ValueAsInt property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int32> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The item's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.
The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int32> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int32> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.

The ValueAsLong property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int64> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The item's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.
The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int64> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int64> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.
When overridden in a derived class, the ValueType property gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the typed value of the item.
For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a ValueType of <xref:System.Int32> by default.
However, the ValueType could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item.
The default value is <xref:System.String>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the item.
When overridden in a derived class, the XmlType property gets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> for the item.
For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the item.
